alerts.post_hidden: This post is hidden. It won't be visible to other users yet.
alerts.post_under_moderation: This post is under moderation. It won't be visible to other users yet.
alerts.refresh_or_try_again: Please refresh the page or try again later.
alerts.not_found: The page you are looking for does not exist or is available for authorized users only. Please contact your organization admin for further details.
alerts.password_reset: Please enter the email address associated with your account. You will receive a password reset link there.
alerts.resend_confirmation: No problem. Just enter your email address to get the confirmation email back.
alerts.no_posts: {buckets} are used to categorize posts. Looks like this {bucket} does not have any submissions from your users yet. But you can always lead the way, submit today!
alerts.completed_all_posts: {buckets} are used to categorize posts. Looks like all posts on this {bucket} are complete. Checkout your completed posts on the {roadmap}, or submit one of your own.
alerts.invalid_board: The {bucket} you are trying to access does not exist.
alerts.moderation_description: The admin of this organization has enabled post moderation; once your post gets approved by them it will be visible to all users. Stick around for a while!
alerts.roadmap_hidden_completed_all_posts: {buckets} are used to categorize posts. Looks like all posts on this {bucket} are complete. Submit more!

cookie_banner.heading: We use cookies!
cookie_banner.text: We and selected partners use cookies or similar technologies to give you the best experience across the website. You can consent to the use of such technologies by closing this notice, by interacting with any link or button outside of this notice or by continuing to browse otherwise.

alerts.excited_alert_message: We're excited to have you here!
alerts.empty_bucket_alert_message: Jump in and create your first post in this {bucket}. Just click on the button below.
